name: Watagaming
body:
### About me
Hi, am Guido Pintus, an Italian student of Computer engineering. I started learning game development on December 2012. Since then i joined a good number of jams and made games and prototypes. At the time of this writing, almost one year later, i am for the first time approaching the challenge of transforming this love in a profession.

### Games

....
TO-DO: publish a nice grid with all the titles i make
....

### What can i do?

I am a programmer. My tools nowadays are Java and JavaScript, but i am looking to extend my variety.
If you are lucky, you can find me doing pixel art at times. 

### Current projects:

Oppression , as Programmer;

some pet projects regarding mobile game development.

### Contacts

About.me: http://about.me/wataCoso 

Twitter: @watacoso

eMail: watacoso@gmail.com
